The label said "dry-clean only," so I took it to the dry-cleaner's.
I dreamed about that scarf for a week,...
...but when I went to pick it up, it was full of holes!
The dry-cleaner didn't even know how it happened.
She was very apologetic, especially as I'm such a good customer.
There was nothing that could be done about the scarf,...
To make it up to me, she gave me free dry-cleaning for a month!
